narrative.iWantTo: I test Tutorials Page of Ticket Master Developer's site

scenario.title: (/products-and-docs/tutorials/) Verification for general page's elements
scenario.step: Then check general page elements for Tutorials Page, where DISQUS = false and LeftMenu = true

scenario.title: (/products-and-docs/tutorials/) Verification for all the page's links

examples.step: Given open Tutorials page
When check visibility and click <elementKey> element of Tutorials page
Then check that new page opened from Tutorials page has <pageURL> and <pageTitle>

values.value: Adding Event Discovery Widget Header Link

Locate Event On Map Widget Header Link
Locate Event On Map Widget Image Link
